items.content_html: A robust, versatile file and folder manager for Node.js, the FileManager class offers essential functions for creating, deleting, reading, writing, and managing files and directories. Lightweight and easy to integrate, its ideal for developers seeking powerful file system management.
items.title: PBJI/FileManagerNode: A robust, versatile file and folder manager for Node.js, the FileManager class offers essential functions for creating, deleting, reading, writing, and managing files and directories. Lightweight and easy to integrate, its ideal for developers seeking powerful file system management.

items.content_html: UK Bank Holidays is a lightweight web application built with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. This app fetches and displays UK bank holiday data from the GOV.UK API, providing an up-to-date view of all official holidays across the United Kingdom.
items.title: przemekmas/UKBankHolidays: UK Bank Holidays is a lightweight web application built with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. This app fetches and displays UK bank holiday data from the GOV.UK API, providing an up-to-date view of all official holidays across the United Kingdom.

items.content_html: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.
items.title: Pro-Sifat-Hasan/chatnest: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: `export-json-to-csv` is a lightweight, high-performance npm package for converting JSON to CSV. It supports nested JSON structures, customizable headers, and handles large datasets efficiently‚Äîideal for seamless data export and interchange.
items.title: john310897/export-json-to-csv: `export-json-to-csv` is a lightweight, high-performance npm package for converting JSON to CSV. It supports nested JSON structures, customizable headers, and handles large datasets efficiently‚Äîideal for seamless data export and interchange.

items.content_html: Fuming is a lightweight and efficient database management system built with TypeScript. It simplifies database operations with type safety, robust query handling, and seamless integration into any modern web application. Fuming is designed as an npm package for easy use in various projects.
items.title: grovixlab/fuming: Fuming is a lightweight and efficient database management system built with TypeScript. It simplifies database operations with type safety, robust query handling, and seamless integration into any modern web application. Fuming is designed as an npm package for easy use in various projects.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
